customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for three years since being recommended to it by my stylist. The best! I have used Kiel's silk stuff and a host of others, nothing comes close. For me it lightly holds my (thankfully) thick hair in place, adds a bit of sheen, and diminishes the encroaching grey. I love it. My salon stopped carrying it as the distribution was apparently spotty so I am now buying it here. Really good for a mild hold and great silky manageability.
customer_reviews.author: pingufreddy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged - Likely due to heat exposure
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years. The consistency/texture of the product was particularly different. Not the same texture and as a result, not the same hold in/on hair. Seems to have been damaged by heat during storage or shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Best product I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I did not use to be a product person but I love everything about SachaJuan. Smells great, in the most minimal way possible. It holds my hair in place all day with just the lightest dab.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Waste Your Money! Save $$s and Get Vaseline!
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd highest volume ingredient, after water, is petrolatum - aka Vaseline. A bare minimum amount is still heavy, sticky, feeling drying, is dulling, and makes my hair stiff. Shame on me for not checking ingredients first. A far better product is the Schwarrtzkopf Bonacure line, also available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Kukla

customer_reviews.title: sticky, icky waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product was sold to me at a salon in Washington, D.C. I really like the salon and the cuts I get there but this product is just terrible. It makes your hair look dirty, damaged and unhealthy. It has an unpleasant knack of making your hair lose the clean, glossy look from when you it wash and also gives it a strange texture that looks really unnatural. I could stay well clear of this product if you have medium length hair especially. On short hair it might be better but I previously used Aveda light elements texturizing creme and plan to return to this product asap.
customer_reviews.author: PRB

product_meta.title: SachaJuan - Hair Wax Pomade - 75 ml
product_meta.description:
Hair Wax is a non-greasy grooming aid that moisturizes and conditions hair. This is a superb finishing tool for all hair types creating texture and shine. SACHAJUAN is driven by the beauty of simplicity. Our approach to hair care is simple: cleanse, condition, and add treatments if needed, to build a uniform foundation for styling. Our goal is to make hair look, feel and move like hair, but better. By strengthening and protecting hair’s natural characteristics, we can improve it – making it easier to care for and control. Inspired by this, we designed our Ocean Silk Technology to help create the desired result for every client. It's a process we've worked with and mastered as professionals, and through the development of each product. We want to give people that feeling of having simply beautiful hair.

BRAND STORY
SACHAJUAN is driven by the beauty of simplicity. Our products help achieve a personal look in the easiest possible way. Each one is designed to produce an effortless look, enabling a confident, modern and personal twist.
